author: NewsBreak Original
title: Judge orders Steve Bannon to report to prison by July 1 for contempt of Congress
text:
By Ehren Wynder ,
4 hours ago June 6 (UPI) -- A federal judge on Thursday ordered former White House adviser Steve Bannon to report to prison by July 1 after an appeals court upheld his conviction.
Steve Bannon, former adviser to Donald Trump, would be the second Trump aide to serve prison time for defying the House Jan. 6 subcommittee after Peter Navarro, who was ordered to begin his sentence in March. File Photo by Jemal Countess/UPI Bannon, who briefly served in Donald Trump 's White House, was found guilty in July 2022 on two counts of contempt of Congress for failing to testify and provide documents to the now-disbanded House Jan. 6 subcommittee.
He was sentenced to serve four months behind bars in October that same year, but he has been able to avoid prison time as he pursued his appeal.
U.S. District Judge Carl Nichols revoked the pause in Bannon's sentence after a three-judge D.C. Circuit Court of Appeals panel last month rejected his appeal.
Nichols on Thursday said, after the appeals court's decision, he did not believe the basis for continuing to hold off Bannon's sentence "exists any longer."
Steve Bannon (pictured, 2022) would be the second former Trump adviser to serve prison time for contempt of Congress. Former Trump aide Peter Navarro is currently serving four months -- also on contempt of Congress charges for defying the Jan. 6 subcommittee. File Photo by Jemal Countess/UPI The judge's ruling is a victory for federal prosecutors, who after the appeals court's ruling called for Bannon to begin his sentence , arguing "there is no longer a 'substantial question of law that is likely to result in a reversal or an order for a new trial.'"
Bannon's lawyer, David Schoen , argued there was " no basis " for his client to begin his sentence immediately, as he can still appeal Nichols' ruling to the full appeals court and then to the Supreme Court .
A federal judge on Thursday ordered former White House adviser Steve Bannon (pictured, 2022) to report to prison by July 1 after an appeals court upheld his conviction. File Photo by Jemal Countess/UPI Bannon would be the second former Trump adviser to serve prison time for contempt of Congress.
Former Trump aide Peter Navarro is currently serving four months -- also on contempt of Congress charges for defying the Jan. 6 subcommittee -- despite several last ditch attempts to avoid prison, including a failed Supreme Court appeal.
Nichols, a Trump appointee, has overseen several cases regarding the Jan. 6 Capitol attack. On Wednesday, he sentenced a rioter who assaulted Capitol police with bear spray to more than six years in federal prison.
He also has rejected the governments use of the obstruction of an official proceeding charge, which has been leveled against hundreds of Jan. 6 defendants, including Trump.
The Supreme Court heard oral arguments on the case in April, with justices in the court's conservative majority arguing the use of the statute against a Jan. 6 defendant was over broad.
Expand All Read in NewsBreak

author: Jessica Goodman, Cox Media Group National Content Desk
title: Woman attacked with sledgehammer, killed on Christmas Eve ‚Äì WHIO TV 7 and WHIO Radio
text: TORRANCE, Calif. ‚Äî A woman was killed after she was attacked with a sledgehammer at a college on Christmas Eve in Torrance, California. The assault happened Sunday just after 7 a.m. in the 16000 block of Crenshaw Boulevard, the Los Angeles County Sheriff‚Äôs Department said, according to KABC . Investigators say that the victim was collecting recyclables at El Camino College in Torrance when she was attacked, the news station reported. A man with a sledgehammer attacked her and fled the area before law enforcement arrived, according to KTLA. The victim was spotted by the gymnasium by someone passing by the area. Officers found her unconscious and she appeared to be bleeding from her head, the news outlet reported. Her dog stayed at her side. The victim was taken to the hospital where she died a day later on Christmas from her injuries, KTLA reported. The sheriff‚Äôs department only identified the victim as an Asian woman between the ages of 60 and 65, according to the Los Angeles Times. Investigators identified the suspect through surveillance footage as Jeffrey Davis, 40, according to KTLA. ‚ÄúThe person that we had an idea of who was on the security footage is, we believe, a homeless person we‚Äôve had contact with before,‚Äù said Sgt. Francisco Esqueda of El Camino College Police, according to the news outlet. ‚ÄúSo we were able to go to the neighboring county park where he sometimes hangs out and that‚Äôs where we found him.‚Äù Davis was arrested shortly after the incident, the LA Times reported.

author: @elnuevosiglo
title: "Hijos de la impunidad con el terrorismo que posan de pacifistas" | El Nuevo Siglo
text: [Jueves, 28 de Diciembre de 2023] ‚ÄúLos que tiran la piedra y esconden la mano son los hijos de la impunidad con el terrorismo que posan de pacifistas, o los que son permisivos y aduladores de los que reincidieron en el terrorismo despu√©s de comprometerse a no repetir‚Äù, Iv√°n Duque, expresidente Los que tiran la piedra y esconden la mano son los hijos de la impunidad con el terrorismo que posan de pacifistas, o los que son permisivos y aduladores de los que reincidieron en el terrorismo despu√©s de comprometerse a no repetir.‚Äî Iv√°n Duque üá®üá¥ (@IvanDuque) [December 28, 2023] ‚ÄúPrometieron ‚Äòel cambio‚Äô: 94 masacres, empoderaron a los bandidos y debilitaron la Fuerza P√∫blica, destruyeron la econom√≠a, en transici√≥n energ√©tica muestran lo que hizo Duque, subieron la gasolina de $9.046 a $14.864, y la corrupci√≥n y el derroche son brutales‚Äù, Ernesto Mac√≠as, exsenador uribista Prometieron ‚Äúel cambio‚Äù:‚Äî Ernesto Mac√≠as Tovar (@ernestomaciast) -94 masacres -Empoderaron a los bandidos y debilitaron la Fuerza P√∫blica -Destruyeron la econom√≠a -En transici√≥n energ√©tica muestran lo que hizo Duque -Subieron la gasolina de $9.046 a $14.864 -La corrupci√≥n y el derroche es brutal. author: Isabella Velez
title: Power of Platonic Love: A Love Letter to my Best Friend
text:
To the person who has never left,
Approaching a new decade of my life means I am closing the door to my current one. I have spent another ten years watching others and learning, otherwise known as people-watching. I have spent a lot of time on the sidelines when it comes to a few things, one in particular is watching people our age experience love: real, true love. For years, I‚Äôve been waiting to get the chance to understand what that feels like, to understand how it feels to have someone who really, truly cares about me. I‚Äôve been waiting to understand how it feels to have someone who never wants to leave my side, someone who wants to experience life with me, someone who chooses to love me. But recently I have realized that I do understand how it feels to have someone like that: it‚Äôs you. You choose to love me, you care for me and you want to experience life with me. I may have not yet found the person I‚Äôm going to be in a romantic relationship with, but I have without a doubt experienced being loved.
A way I know I‚Äôve learned what real love is from your sincerity. Having a person in my life as sincere as you is all I can ask for. There‚Äôs never been any competition between us. We never compare, but rather challenge each other. We truly want each other to succeed and be the best version of ourselves.
To be a good person is to be half the person you are, and I think we both know I‚Äôm not even that. You once wrote, ‚ÄúI keep you aligned, and you keep me on edge.‚Äù It‚Äôs incredibly true but as any person who loves another, you have made sure to give it to me straight always. You call me out when I need to be, letting me know that you genuinely want the best for me always.
Despite the distance and our individual journeys of life, we have always made sure to remain constant in each other‚Äôs lives. We make sure to hold each other accountable. We encourage each other. We are proud of each other. For as long as I can remember, we have always been planning our life together. I mean, if we can survive distance, we can survive anything, right?
It seems like all I hear about is romantic relationships, but, truthfully, platonic relationships are just as strong and meaningful. The strength of our friendship is beyond words. We will be at each other‚Äôs weddings, not getting married to each other, but standing right behind the other as they say ‚ÄúI do‚Äù to the love of their life. We will get a house, not together, but close enough so we can have movie nights every night. We‚Äôll start a family, not together, but we‚Äôll be the ‚Äòmadrina‚Äô to each other‚Äôs firstborn. We‚Äôll experience life together. To think I was never going to find someone who loved me is bizarre because I‚Äôve already been lucky enough to find you: someone who has loved me for years. There has been so much change in our life- school, jobs, friends, homes- but there has been one constant; that constant is you, which is just as incredible as a boyfriend or husband.
Love,
Your Best Friend

author: andres-alejandro
title: Por qu√© Kamala Harris pas√≥ de la campa√±a de la alegr√≠a a llamar a Trump ‚Äúfascista‚Äù
text: El mi√©rcoles por la tarde, Kamala Harris apareci√≥ frente a la residencia de la vicepresidenta en Washington DC y lanz√≥ un ataque breve pero mordaz contra Donald Trump. Dijo que estaba ‚Äúcada vez m√°s desquiciado e inestable‚Äù y cit√≥ los comentarios cr√≠ticos sobre Trump que realiz√≥ John Kelly , el exjefe de gabinete en los tiempos en que el republicano estuvo en la Casa Blanca.En una entrevista con The New York Times , Kelly describi√≥ a Trump como alguien que ‚Äúciertamente entra en la definici√≥n general de los fascistas‚Äù y que hab√≠a expresado palabras favorables hacia Adolf Hitler en varias ocasiones.Harris asegur√≥ que su rival quer√≠a tener ‚Äúpoder sin control‚Äù. M√°s tarde, durante un debate ciudadano auspiciado por la cadena CNN, le preguntaron si cre√≠a que Trump era un ‚Äúfascista‚Äù, a lo que respondi√≥: ‚ÄúS√≠, lo creo‚Äù . Recomendamos Poco despu√©s, Trump public√≥ en sus redes sociales que los comentarios de Harris eran una se√±al de que estaba perdiendo. Dijo que ella estaba ‚Äúelevando cada vez m√°s su ret√≥rica, llegando a llamarme Adolf Hitler, y cualquier otra cosa que se le ocurra en su retorcida mente‚Äù.En la recta final de las campa√±as pol√≠ticas, especialmente en una tan re√±ida como la presidencial de 2024, los mensajes de los candidatos tienden naturalmente a volverse negativos . Los ataques suelen ser m√°s eficaces para motivar a los simpatizantes a acudir a las urnas y perturbar las campa√±as de los contrincantes.Sin embargo, la actitud m√°s dura de Harris hacia Trump contrasta con los mensajes optimistas y ‚Äúalegres‚Äù de los primeros d√≠as de su campa√±a.Harris se apart√≥ en gran medida del mensaje central de la campa√±a del presidente Joe Biden de que Trump supon√≠a una amenaza existencial para la democracia estadounidense.Sin embargo, seg√∫n el estratega pol√≠tico Matt Bennett, del grupo dem√≥crata centrista Third Way, est√° claro por qu√© Harris se ha decantado cada vez m√°s a amplificar el oscuro retrato de Kelly de Trump como un hombre con tendencias autoritarias. ‚ÄúTodo lo que hace ahora es por t√°ctica‚Äù , dijo. ‚ÄúEl imperativo era asegurarse de que el mayor n√∫mero posible de votantes conociera lo que dijo Kelly‚Äù.Las √∫ltimas declaraciones de la vicepresidenta se producen tras una estrategia de varias semanas de su campa√±a para atraer a votantes independientes y republicanos moderados que podr√≠an estar abiertos a apoyar la candidatura dem√≥crata.Las encuestas sugieren que la competencia est√° muy re√±ida y que ninguno de los candidatos tiene una ventaja decisiva en ninguno de los estados clave.Los suburbios alrededor de las ciudades m√°s grandes en los estados ‚Äúbisagra‚Äù - Filadelfia, Detroit, Milwaukee y Phoenix, por ejemplo - est√°n poblados por profesionales con educaci√≥n universitaria que tradicionalmente han votado por los republicanos, pero que las encuestas indican tienen dudas sobre el regreso de Trump a la Casa Blanca .‚ÄúSu argumento para ganar es crear una coalici√≥n lo m√°s amplia posible y atraer a los republicanos descontentos, gente que no cree que pueda volver a votar a Trump‚Äù, dijo Bennett.Devynn DeVelasco, una ciudadana de 20 a√±os en Nebraska que se declara independiente, es una de las que ya se hab√≠an convencido de no votar a Trump por la larga lista de republicanos de alto rango, que trabajaron para el entonces presidente y que dicen que su exjefe no es apto para el cargo.Aunque espera que algunos republicanos se unan a ella para apoyar a Harris, le preocupa que los se√±alamientos que se hacen sobre el expresidente generen cansancio entre los votantes.‚ÄúCuando estos reportes [sobre los comentarios de Kelly] salieron, no me sorprendi√≥, no son muy novedosos‚Äù, dijo DeVelasco a la BBC.La estratega republicana Denise Grace Gitsham dijo que los votantes han estado escuchando una ret√≥rica similar sobre Trump desde 2016 , por lo que era poco probable que cualquier nueva acusaci√≥n moviera la balanza.‚ÄúSi vas a votar en contra de Donald Trump porque no te gusta su personalidad, ya eres un votante decidido‚Äù, explica Gitsham a la BBC. ‚ÄúPero si eres alguien que se fija en las pol√≠ticas y eso te importa m√°s que la personalidad, entonces vas a elegir a quien sentiste que lo hizo mejor en la Casa Blanca‚Äù.Tanto Harris como Trump han afilado sus dardos en los √∫ltimos d√≠as. El lunes, durante una gira por los estados m√°s disputados del Medio Oeste, Harris advirti√≥ repetidamente de las consecuencias de una presidencia de Trump sobre el derecho al aborto, la salud, la econom√≠a y la pol√≠tica exterior estadounidense.El viernes celebrar√° un mitin en Texas, el estado que, seg√∫n ella, representa de forma m√°s dram√°tica el futuro antiabortista del pa√≠s si Trump vuelve al poder.El pr√≥ximo martes se concentrar√° en Washington DC, con un mitin en el National Mall, donde Trump habl√≥ antes de que algunos de sus partidarios atacaran el Capitolio el 6 de enero de 2021.Trump, por su parte, ha continuado con su bater√≠a de ataques contra su rival dem√≥crata. En un foro en Carolina del Norte , dijo que Harris era ‚Äúperezosa‚Äù y ‚Äúest√∫pida‚Äù y que solo lleg√≥ a ser candidata de su partido por su etnia y g√©nero.Tambi√©n lanz√≥ su propia advertencia, diciendo que ‚Äúpuede que no quede un pa√≠s‚Äù si gana Harris.Sin embargo, ninguna de estas frases supone un cambio especial para Trump, que ha pasado la mayor parte de su campa√±a atacando a los dem√≥cratas y ci√±√©ndose a su mensaje central sobre inmigraci√≥n, comercio y econom√≠a.El discurso de cierre de Harris, mientras tanto, dirigido a ganarse a los republicanos anti-Trump y a los independientes, no est√° exento de riesgos, dijo el estratega dem√≥crata Bennett.‚ÄúSiempre debes recortar una cosa para tratar de ayudar a promover otro mensaje‚Äù, explica Bennett. ‚ÄúEl tiempo del candidato y el tiempo gastado en publicidad son los dos bienes m√°s preciados. Y c√≥mo los gastas importa‚Äù.Trump lleva m√°s de ocho a√±os siendo una figura polarizadora en la pol√≠tica estadounidense. La mayor√≠a de los estadounidenses tienen opiniones muy arraigadas sobre √©l.Si el sentimiento anti-Trump lleva a Harris a la cima el d√≠a de las elecciones, su √∫ltimo √©nfasis estrat√©gico habr√° valido la pena. Si no, las dudas llegar√°n de forma r√°pida y furiosa. (I)

author: Get News
title: Ken‚Äôs Hardwood Barbecue, Trinity Missionary Baptist Church, and Sigma Pi Phi Fraternity Unite to Celebrate Christmas Through Acts of Kindness | User | mammothtimes.com
text:
Tucson, AZ, USA - December 29, 2023 - In the spirit of Christmas, a day renowned for its traditions of giving and sharing, Ken's Hardwood Barbecue, in partnership with Trinity Missionary Baptist Church and Sigma Pi Phi Fraternity, is reaffirming its commitment to service to others.
Ken Alexander, the driving force behind this heartwarming collaboration, shares, "On a day known for giving, we feel service to others is the best way for us to celebrate Christmas."
As the holiday season approaches, Ken's Hardwood Barbecue, Trinity Missionary Baptist Church, and Sigma Pi Phi Fraternity joins hands for the fifth consecutive year to extend a helping hand to the hungry and unhoused in the Tucson area. On Christmas Day, they convene at Santa Rita Park to provide a hot, delicious meal, free of charge, to those in need.
The Big Red Mobile Kitchen, symbolizing the unity of these organizations, will be on-site to serve and share the warmth of the season with the community. This annual event embodies the true spirit of Christmas by bringing nourishment and a sense of community to individuals who may be facing hardship during the holiday season.
This commitment to selfless service has a rich history deeply rooted in the heart of Ken's family. In 2000, Ken Alexander's mother initiated a program in Jeffersonville, IN, known as the King's Table, dedicated to feeding the hungry and unhoused in the community. This remarkable program, born out of compassion and love for the community, continues to serve its residents to this day.
For more information about Ken's Hardwood Barbecue or to explore its menu, visit www.kenshardwoodbbq.com or email catering@kenshardwoodbbq.com or call (520) 745-4746. (5250 E 22nd Street, Tucson, AZ 85711)
About Ken's Hardwood Barbecue
Ken's Hardwood Barbecue is a family-owned, award winning restaurant in Tucson, AZ, renowned for its unique blend of Southern comfort cuisine and expertly smoked meats. Drawing from four generations of culinary passion, the restaurant is a testament to the deep-seated traditions of Kentucky and Tennessee. With a commitment to authenticity and quality, Ken's Hardwood Barbecue continues to enthrall its patrons with mouthwatering dishes that speak of a rich heritage.

author: Reda√ß√£o
title: D√≥lar perde for√ßa na reta final do preg√£o e recua 0,22% com Lula no radar
text:
27/06/2024 - 17:56
Em dia marcado por volatilidade e trocas de sinal, o d√≥lar √† vista se firmou em baixa moderada na √∫ltima hora de neg√≥cios e encerrou a sess√£o desta quinta-feira, 27, em queda de 0,22%, cotado a R$ 5,5075. Na m√°xima, no in√≠cio da tarde, a moeda havia superado R$ 5,53, com m√°xima a R$ 5,5390.
O movimento de aprecia√ß√£o do real na reta final do preg√£o se deu em meio a declara√ß√µes do presidente Luiz In√°cio Lula da Silva sobre a pol√≠tica fiscal e a uma diminui√ß√£o dos ganhos do d√≥lar em rela√ß√£o a outras divisas latino-americanas, em especial o peso mexicano.
Em entrevista √† r√°dio Itatiaia, em Minas Gerais, Lula deu sinais de que est√° atento √† pauta da redu√ß√£o de gastos. O presidente afirmou que ‚Äúsempre h√° lugar para cortar no or√ßamento‚Äù e que o ‚ÄúBrasil tem muito subs√≠dios e desonera√ß√£o‚Äù.
Ao mencionar que o governo realiza uma ‚Äúopera√ß√£o pente-fino‚Äù em todos os minist√©rios, Lula disse que por mais que ‚Äúqueria fazer pol√≠tica social‚Äù, o pa√≠s n√£o pode ‚Äújogar dinheiro fora‚Äù. Mais uma vez, o presidente comentou a deprecia√ß√£o do real, dizendo que ‚Äúh√° muitas pessoas que querem viver de especula√ß√£o, apostando na alta do d√≥lar‚Äù.
Al√©m disso, o presidente elogiou o atual diretor de Pol√≠tica Monet√°ria do Banco Central, Gabriel Gal√≠polo, nome mais cotado para substituir o presidente do BC, Roberto Campos Neto. Para Lula, Gal√≠polo √© um ‚Äúmenino de ouro, competente e honesto‚Äù, com ‚Äútodas as condi√ß√µes de ser presidente do BC‚Äù. Parte do tombo recente do real esteve relacionado, segundo analistas, a temores de que Lula indique para a presid√™ncia do BC um nome historicamente ligado ao PT ou um economista heterodoxo.
‚ÄúA sensa√ß√£o que se tem √© que esse patamar do d√≥lar e a maneira com que o c√¢mbio se depreciou come√ßam a afetar Bras√≠lia. Temos ver o que vai sair agora de medidas. A parte dif√≠cil de fazer o ajuste fiscal √© cortar gasto‚Äù, afirma o economista-chefe da Western Asset, Adauto Lima.
Para o economista, medidas mais duras, como mudan√ßa de regras de crescimento de despesas, trariam resultados claros. J√° revis√£o de gastos a partir da passagem de um ‚Äúpente-fino‚Äù nas despesas pode at√© trazer at√© ganhos pontuais, mas n√£o t√™m o poder de afastar a desconfian√ßa dos investidores, uma vez que os n√∫meros podem ser superestimados.
Operadores afirmam que a forma√ß√£o da taxa de c√¢mbio tamb√©m esteve muito suscet√≠vel hoje a movimentos t√©cnicos, com movimentos t√≠picos de rolagem de posi√ß√µes no segmento futuro na virada do m√™s e a prepara√ß√£o para a disputa amanh√£, 28, em torno da forma√ß√£o da √∫ltima taxa Ptax de junho, do segundo trimestre e do primeiro semestre. O contrato de d√≥lar futuro para julho teve giro forte, ao redor de US$ 20 bilh√µes.
Apesar do refresco hoje, o d√≥lar ainda acumula alta de 1,23% na semana e de 4,89% no m√™s, o que leva a valoriza√ß√£o da moeda americana no ano a 13,48%. O real √© a segunda divisa global relevante que mais perde em rela√ß√£o ao d√≥lar em 2024, atr√°s apenas do iene.
‚ÄúO real foi muito mal recentemente e hoje foi melhor que as outras divisas. O principal driver para a deprecia√ß√£o do real no ano √© externo, com a valoriza√ß√£o global do d√≥lar, que acelerou recentemente. Mas os fatores idiossincr√°ticos fizeram o real ir bem pior que os pares nos √∫ltimos tr√™s meses. √â algo bem forte‚Äù, afirma Lima, da Western Asset.
Apesar da queda das taxas dos Treasuries e do leve recuo do √≠ndice DXY, as principais divisas latino-americanas, √† exce√ß√£o do real, perderam for√ßa hoje, em especial os pesos chileno e mexicano. O real andou na contram√£o na maior parte do dia, mas era percept√≠vel que o maior ou menor grau de desvaloriza√ß√£o dos pares se refletia no comportamento da moeda brasileira.
Os momentos em que o d√≥lar permaneceu abaixo de R$ 5,50 no fim da tarde coincidiram que com a diminui√ß√£o dos ganhos da moeda americana em rela√ß√£o ao peso mexicano, na esteira da decis√£o do Banco Central do M√©xico (Banxico) de manter a taxa b√°sica de juros do pa√≠s em 11% ao ano.
Pela manh√£, durante apresenta√ß√£o do Relat√≥rio Trimestral de Infla√ß√£o (RT), em S√£o Paulo, Roberto Campos Neto disse que o ‚Äúc√¢mbio apresentou uma desvaloriza√ß√£o que est√° em linha com algumas v√°rias que tamb√©m simbolizam o pr√™mio de risco no Brasil‚Äù, como o juro da NTN-B longa. O presidente do BC reiterou que a autoridade monet√°ria n√£o vai intervir no c√¢mbio para mirar uma cota√ß√£o, mas apenas para corrigir eventual disfuncionalidade do mercado.

Segundo a Par√≥quia Santo Ant√¥nio de Lisboa, a trezena come√ßou na √∫ltima quinta-feira (30). A programa√ß√£o, que conta com atra√ß√µes religiosas e sociais, segue at√© o dia 16.
O dia do santo √© comemorado no dia 13 de junho. Nesta data, haver√° prociss√£o √†s 19h e missa solene √†s 19h30, celebrada pelo p√°roco Jos√© Luciano Matos Santana. Al√©m disso, a programa√ß√£o conta com shows e comidas.

author: CNN Newsource
title: Venezuela anuncia ejercicio militar y acusa al Reino Unido de ‚Äúprovocaci√≥n hostil‚Äù por buque en las costas de Guyana
text:
Venezuela anuncia ejercicio militar y acusa al Reino Unido de ‚Äúprovocaci√≥n hostil‚Äù por buque en las costas de Guyana
macamilarincon
(CNN Espa√±ol) ‚Äì‚Äì El presidente de Venezuela, Nicol√°s Maduro, anunci√≥ este jueves que orden√≥ una acci√≥n conjunta defensiva en respuesta a lo que se√±al√≥ como una ‚Äúprovocaci√≥n del Reino Unido‚Äù luego de que inicialmente la BBC reportara, citando al Ministerio de Defensa brit√°nico, que se enviar√≠a un buque patrullero a las costas de Guyana.
¬øC√≥mo es la riqueza del Esequibo y c√≥mo contribuy√≥ al crecimiento exponencial de Guyana?
‚ÄúPor eso he ordenado la activaci√≥n de una acci√≥n conjunta de toda la fuerza armada nacional militar bolivariana sobre el caribe oriental de Venezuela, sobre la fachada atl√°ntica, una acci√≥n conjunta de car√°cter defensiva como respuesta a la provocaci√≥n y a la amenaza del Reino Unido contra la paz y la soberan√≠a de nuestro pa√≠s‚Äù, afirm√≥ Maduro durante la ceremonia de salutaci√≥n de fin de a√±o a la Fuerza Armada Nacional Bolivariana (FANB).
La reacci√≥n de Venezuela sigue a un reporte de la BBC del domingo en el que indicaba, citando al Ministerio de Defensa, que el Reino Unido se preparaba para ‚Äúenviar un buque de guerra a Guyana en una muestra de apoyo diplom√°tico y militar a la antigua colonia brit√°nica‚Äù.
¬øQu√© sigue ahora en la disputa entre Venezuela y Guyana por el Esequibo? Puntos claves del acuerdo y posibles escenarios
El HMS Trent, un patrullero de la Marina brit√°nica, agreg√≥ la BBC, visitar√° Guyana, ‚Äúaliado regional y socio de la Commonwealth, a finales de este mes como parte de una serie de compromisos en la regi√≥n durante su despliegue de tareas de patrulla en el Atl√°ntico‚Äù. El Ministerio de Defensa del Reino Unido confirm√≥ a CNN en Londres esta declaraci√≥n.
Madur√≥ calific√≥ a la respuesta venezolana como ‚Äúacci√≥n conjunta militar general Domingo Sifonte‚Äù en honor al general que Maduro considera h√©roe de la Guyana Esequiba y a quien, adem√°s, se le rendir√° homenaje en enero ‚Äútrayendo sus restos a que descanse definitivamente en el pante√≥n de los h√©roes de Venezuela‚Äù.
Venezuela y Guyana acuerdan seguir con di√°logo sobre disputa del Esequibo
La Canciller√≠a de Venezuela public√≥ un comunicado en rechazo a la llegada del buque brit√°nico y advirti√≥ a la Comunidad del Caribe (Caricom) y a la Comunidad de Estados Latinoamericanos y Caribe√±os (Celac) de que las acciones contradicen el entendimiento acordado el 14 de diciembre entre Venezuela y Guyana.
‚ÄúLa presencia de la nave militar es extremadamente grave, ya que viene acompa√±ada de declaraciones por parte de voceros pol√≠ticos y militares de quien fungi√≥ como despojador de la Guyana Esequiba, el cual insiste en inmiscuirse en dicha controversia‚Äù, dice el comunicado.
El encuentro que se llev√≥ a cabo el 14 de diciembre entre los mandatarios de Guyana y Venezuela en San Vicente y las Granadinas cerr√≥ con el compromiso de mantener la v√≠a diplom√°tica como el √∫nico camino para resolver el conflicto, y se estableci√≥ el acuerdo de 11 puntos suscrito por las partes y los mediadores de ambos pa√≠ses.
‚ÄúVenezuela insta a las autoridades guyanesas a tomar medidas inmediatas para el retiro del buque HMS Trent, y abstenerse de seguir involucrando a potencias militares en la controversia territorial‚Äù, afirma el comunicado.
CNN est√° intentando comunicarse con el Ministerio de Defensa del Reino Unido por los informes de que personal militar venezolano participar√° en ejercicios militares en el golfo de Paria en respuesta al despliegue del HMS Trent en Guyana.
Osmary Hern√°ndez colabor√≥ con este reporte.
